content: It’s almost the end of the year now, and I have over 90 rejections. They’re across the board: writers’ conferences, publications, speaking gigs, freelance work, news stations. I read down the list, remembering my carefully crafted emails or submissions, the love I’d begun injecting into them. Thank you for taking the time to hold a piece of me, I now say as I push the submission button. I appreciate you.
